module: Module-level comment: The `altera_up_av_config_auto_init_ob_de10_standard` module initializes audio and video settings on DE10-Standard FPGA boards by reading configuration data from audio and video ROMs based on input `rom_address`. It outputs combined configuration using a bitwise OR of `audio_rom_data` and `video_rom_data`, drawn from two submodules that handle audio and video ROM data retrieval and initialization. This combined output ensures simultaneous setup of audiovisual peripherals.
